downloadDescription: HPC Pack 2019 provides enterprise-class tools, performance and scalability for a highly productive HPC environment either on premises, Hybrid or Azure Cloud.
detailsSection:
HPC Pack 2019 is a high performance computing (HPC) solution that combines a comprehensive set of deployment, administration, job scheduling, and monitoring tools for your HPC cluster environment, and a flexible platform for developing and running HPC applications. It delivers enterprise-class tools, performance and scalability for a highly productive HPC environment, providing an integrated cluster environment featuring the HPC Job Scheduler, Message Passing Interface (MPI) and Service-Oriented Architecture (SOA) interactive application support, cluster management & monitoring tools. HPC Pack 2019 also delivers cloud ready solutions for Hybrid and Cloud on Microsoft Azure.

Note: HPC Pack 2019.zip is the original release version for 6.0.7205 and HPC Pack 2019_refreshed_6.0.7214.zip is the latest refreshed version including two additional fixes: 1) a setup fix to support managed identify for Azure SQL databases; 2) a Linux node agent fix for memory/CPU leaks. Please consider to use the latest refreshed version whenever possible.
systemRequirementsSection:
HPC Pack 2019 supported Operating Systems
  • Head nodes: Windows Server 2019, Windows Server 2016, Windows Server 2012 R2 (no support for SQL Express 2019)
  • Compute nodes: Windows Server 2019, Windows Server 2016, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows Server 2012
  • Broker nodes: Windows Server 2019, Windows Server 2016, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows Server 2012
  • Workstation nodes: x86 or x64 versions of Windows 8.1 Pro or Enterprise, windows 10
  • Unmanaged server nodes: Windows Server 2019, Windows Server 2016, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows Server 2012
  • Linux Compute nodes: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.5 - 7.8, CentOS-based 7.5 - 7.8, Ubuntu Server 14.04 LTS, Ubuntu Server 16.04 LTS, Ubuntu Server 18.04 LTS, SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12
  • Client: Windows Server 2019, Windows Server 2016, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows Server 2012, Windows 10, Windows 8.1


    • Additional notes: CPU: x64 architecture computer, except for Workstation nodes which may run x86-based or x64-based processors
    RAM: 4GB
    Minimum disk space for setup: 50 GB
    Network interface card: At least one network interface card (NIC) is required. Additional NICs may be required depending on the selected network topology
installInstructionSection:
Prior to installation, please review the 'What's New' and 'Release Notes' available on the Microsoft HPC Pack Documentations.

Download the 'HPC Pack 2019.zip' file, extract the contents to the root of your drive and run 'setup.exe' to start the HPC Pack 2019 installation wizard on a supported Windows Server based computer.
